name: Music Arrow: FNF Game
description:
A Dad is a daughter’s first love. And, Do you wanna become her boyfriend? Challenge her dad to win her heart.
Match notes to score points and don’t let your girlfriend’s dad beat you.
Have fun! And enjoy favorite songs!

How to do that? Really easy! Just tap the arrow when they exact match.
Feel the music and rock the beat
Dance with the beat!
